entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 early this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
